parameters.subject: =Still need BMW service? We're here to help
=BMW Service Question - Common Concerns Answered
=Last check-in about your BMW service
=Thanks for your interest in our BMW services - Next Steps

parameters.content:
Workflow 2: Email Nurture Sequence
Purpose: 4-email drip campaign with intelligent reply checking
Email Sequence:

Welcome Email (Immediate): Service confirmation + booking links
Follow-up #1 (Day 2): "Still need service?" with call-to-action
Follow-up #2 (Day 5): FAQ format addressing common concerns
Final Follow-up (Day 8): Soft close with no-pressure messaging

Smart Logic:

Checks Google Sheets for "Replied: YES" before each email
Stops sequence if customer has responded
Professional HTML templates with BMW branding
Mobile-responsive design
